div.p: Parties that may or should contribute or have contributed information to the Act. Such information includes information leading to the decision to perform the Act and how to perform the Act (e.g., consultant), information that the Act itself seeks to reveal (e.g., informant of clinical history), or information about what Act was performed (e.g., informant witness).
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ParticipationType where concept is-a _ParticipationInformationGenerator

Exclude these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ParticipationType
Code
Display
_ParticipationInformationGenerator ParticipationInformationGenerator Parties that may or should contribute or have contributed information to the Act. Such information includes information leading to the decision to perform the Act and how to perform the Act (e.g., consultant), information that the Act itself seeks to reveal (e.g., informant of clinical history), or information about what Act was performed (e.g., informant witness).

Such information includes information leading to the decision to perform the Act and how to perform the Act (e.g., consultant), information that the Act itself seeks to reveal (e.g., informant of clinical history), or information about what Act was performed (e.g., informant witness).
